escalate: ESC if cx is asking about tracking/order update

If cx doesn't provide the info necessary for an escalation after asking, ESC anyways
ESC inquiries you don't know the answer to including restock date

Let cx have the last word!
templates: If cx insists on sending a screenshot, use CSS shortcut
If cx mention Odyssey, use AAO shortcut
If cx has an Amazon store and is comparing products on the website vs their products on Amazon store:
dos_and_donts: Items that don't qualify for free shipping have "Shipping Charges apply" on the product page
drive_to_purchase: If a cx shares the age, make sure to filter the link by "age"
When sending links with collections, filter by "bestsellers"
For sensory items, ask to describe the needs and challenges before recommending anything
promo_and_exclusions: Codes can be applied to sale items!
The welcome 10% off code can not be applied to ClassWallet purchases

Liked ‚ÄúThanks. It looks like the $308 price is in effect, and the taxes and shipping is on top of that. This is why you're seeing a higher price at checkout.‚Äù

I guess my last question is why should I pay NY sales tax when you are shipping out of state and there is not a store in NC. Usually, if there isn't a store in my state, the item is shipped to me but I don't pay sales tax.

White & Warren: Great question! Sales tax is charged based on state tax laws, not store locations. New York requires sales tax to be collected on certain transactions, even when items are shipped out of state. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to let me know.
